description: Coordination sequence for lattice D*_6 (with edges defined by l_1 norm = 1).
references: J. Serra-Sagrista, Enumeration of lattice points in l_1 norm, Information Processing Letters, 76, no. 1-2 (2000), 39-44.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (6, -15, 20, -15, 6, -1).
formula: a(m)=add(2^k*binomial(n, k)*binomial(m-1, k-1), k=0..n)+2^n*binomial((n+2*m)/2-1, n-1); with n=6.Conjecture: a(n)=(4*n*(31+10*n^2+4*n^4))/15. G.f.: (1+6*x+x^2)*(1+14*x^2+x^4)/(1-x)^6. [Colin Barker, Apr 14 2012]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, J. Serra-Sagrista (jserra(AT)ccd.uab.es)
